creator: Steven.Geens@gmail.com
text:
When trying to call the clonesheet method for a sheet that contains a note,
the following exception is thrown:
The class org.apache.poi.hssf.record.DVRecord needs to define a clone method

The problem occured with the latest trunk SVN build (CET 2008/01/10 19:34).

This seems to be related to bug 44200.

Created attachment 21375
Testcase for problem

A simple testcase to illustrate the bug.
Code copied from the bug 44200, different excel sheet created.
creator: Steven.Geens@gmail.com
Steven.Geens@gmail.com
text:
Original description incorrect:

When trying to call the clonesheet method for a sheet that contains a note,
the following exception is thrown:

should be:

When trying to call the clonesheet method for a sheet that contains a validation
list, the following exception is thrown:

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text: Thanks for the failing test and file, now fixed in svn trunk
